sketch.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a simple, quickly made drawing that does not show much detail
sketch.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Cantor drew a rough sketch of his apartment on a napkin.
sketch.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a short humorous scene on a television programme, in a theatre etc, that is part of a larger show
sketch.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Her TV programme is made up of a series of comic sketches.
sketch.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a short written or spoken description
sketch.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: a thumbnail sketch (=very brief description) of topics treated in depth elsewhere
a brief sketch of the main weaknesses of the British economy
sketch.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to draw a sketch of something
sketch.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to describe something in a general way, giving the basic ideas
sketch.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Holford sketched a 10-year programme for rebuilding the city.
